summary:
Croatia is a country in Central and Southeast Europe, located by the Adriatic Sea. It has a long history, dating back to the 6th century when the Croats arrived. Over time, it became a kingdom and later formed unions with Hungary and Austria. In 1991, Croatia gained independence after a war.

Today, it is a republic with a strong economy and a member of the European Union and NATO. Croatia is known for its beautiful coast, attracting many tourists. It also plays a role in Europe's energy supply. The country has a good quality of life, offering free education and healthcare.
title: Croatia
